solution_line_template: If the initial price was ${initial_price}, and the price of the monster box of cereal reduced by ${price_reduction}, the new price is ${initial_price}-${price_reduction} = $<<{initial_price}-{price_reduction}={new_price}>>{new_price}
If Romina bought {num_boxes_bought} such boxes, he paid {num_boxes_bought}*${new_price} = $<<{num_boxes_bought}*{new_price}={total_price_paid}>>{total_price_paid}
